mapper.select: select userinfo.*,usertask.running_task_id,usergame.is_get_login_reward_this_day,usergame.uconsecutive from userinfo,usertask,usergame where userinfo.id = #{id} and userinfo.password = #{password} and usertask.uid=userinfo.uid and usergame.uid=userinfo.uid
insert into userinfo (upuid, upid, uname, uface, ugender, urtime) values (#{upuid}, #{upid}, #{uname}, #{uface}, #{ugender}, #{urtime})
update usergame set ultime=#{ultime} where uid = #{uid}
select userjjc.* ,userinfo.id,usergame.is_get_login_reward_this_day from userinfo,userjjc,usergame where userinfo.uid = userjjc.uid and userinfo.utoken= #{utoken} and usergame.uid=userinfo.uid

select userjjc.* ,userinfo.id,usergame.is_get_login_reward_this_day,usergame.ugold,usergame.ucharge from userinfo,userjjc,usergame where userinfo.uid = userjjc.uid and userinfo.utoken= #{utoken} and usergame.uid=userinfo.uid
